feed.title: Google Cloud: Access Transparency
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Access Transparency

entry.content: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka has reached general availability. This managed service allows you to use Apache Kafka with minimal operational overhead.
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available

entry.content: IAM System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Service is available in Preview.
entry.summary: The SCIM API is now available for cross-domain identity management.
entry.title: Feature: SCIM API now in Preview

entry.summary: NCC Gateway has reached general availability. This marks a significant milestone for the product.
entry.title: Feature: NCC Gateway Now Generally Available

entry.content: Vertex AI Agent Engine is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Vertex AI Agent Engine has reached general availability. This feature allows for the creation of advanced AI agents.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Agent Engine Now Generally Available

entry.summary: NCC Gateway is now available in preview. This new feature offers enhanced capabilities for managing your network connections.
entry.title: Feature: NCC Gateway Now in Preview

entry.summary: Great news! Certificate Manager has officially reached General Availability. This means itâ€™s ready for widespread use in your projects.
entry.title: Feature: Certificate Manager Now Generally Available

entry.content: Memorystore for Redis Cluster is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: We are excited to announce that Memorystore for Redis Cluster is now generally available. This feature provides a fully managed Redis cluster solution, simplifying the deployment and management of scalable Redis for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Redis Cluster Now Generally Available

entry.summary: We are excited to announce that Memorystore for Valkey is now generally available. This feature provides a fully managed in-memory data store, offering high performance and scalability for your caching and session management needs.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Valkey Now Generally Available

entry.summary: Cloud TPU is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud TPU now generally available

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency has reached the General Availability stage for its support of the Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency Now Supports Chrome Enterprise Premium Secure Gateway

entry.summary: Image streaming has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Image streaming now available

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Web Risk in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports Web Risk in the GA stage.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency now supports Web Risk

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Firebase Data Connect in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect in Google Cloud.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency for Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Transparency supports Firebase Data Connect in the Preview stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect in preview.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency now supports Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Transparency supports BigQuery data preparation in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Transparency now supports BigQuery data preparation in general availability. This feature enhances security and compliance by providing visibility into data access.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency for BigQuery
